page.title: 17Kirknewton Gala Day
page.content: In the middle of the 19th century the highlight of the year was the Kirknewton Play.The people followed a Pipe Band round the Parish getting refreshments on the way.A dance was held at night on the village green. Later Kirknewton Gymnastic Games were held in August each year.There were races for quarrymen,ploughmen and other workers.A schoolboys' one mile relay was run."Cutting the Goose" was a race in which the women tried to catch a pig. In 1928 Kirknewton Gala Day began. There is still a procession after the band. The election of a Gala Queen has been re-introduced recently.The inter-school relay races are still a big attraction. It is a happy day for young and old. Jane Garrard.
